sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The Christian man: or, The reparation of nature by grace. VVritten in French by John Francis Senault; and now Englished. Homme chrestien. English Senault, Jean-François, 1601-1672.
[16], 400 p.
Printed for M.M. G. Bedell, and T.C. and are to be sold at their shop at the Middle-Temple-gate in Fleetstreet, London, : 1650.
A translation of: L'homme chrestien. Title page in red and black. Annotation on Thomason copy: "May. 10". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[16], 400 p.
Printed for M.M. G. Bedell, and T.C. and are to be sold at their shop at the Middle-Temple-gate in Fleetstreet, London, : 1650.
A translation of: L'homme chrestien. Title page in red and black. Annotation on Thomason copy: "May. 10". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

T.C.
their shop at the Middle-Temple-gate in Fleetstreet
